article_node.title: Top cheap internet providers in Tucson, AZ: Compare plans and prices in 2025
article_node.summary: The article reviews internet options in Tucson, Arizona, listing six providers—T-Mobile, Verizon 5G, CenturyLink, Hughesnet, Cox, and Quantum Fiber—along with their pricing, speeds, and connection types. Hughesnet is the cheapest satellite option starting at $39.99/month, while Quantum Fiber offers the fastest speeds up to 2,000 Mbps for $110/month. It also highlights special affordability programs such as T‑Mobile Project 10Million, Verizon Forward, and Cox ConnectAssist. The guide advises consumers to consider availability, speed, cost, contract terms, and customer service when choosing a provider.
